title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What's next for GGG
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - What's next for GGG
description:
Chris is joined this week by longtime boxing writer and friend of the podcast, Keith Idec. The guys dive into the last with GGG and who he should be considering for his next fight, Daniel Jacobs getting back in the ring this week, and much more. Laster in the podcast, Daniel Jacobs stops by to tell his side of why he hasn't had a fight in a long time and what we can expect from him this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
